page.title: 20Chidren's Games In Moulton
page.content: Chase - As many people as you like play this game. 1 person has to has to chase the rest of the people. When the person gets everyone the game ends and a new person chases. Scarecrowtick - any number of people can play this. 1 person is on they have to try to touch somebody. The person they get has to stand like a scarecrow until somebody frees them running under their arms. Piggy In The Middle - 3 people can play this game. They stand in a straight line with a space between each person. The person on each side throws a ball over the person in the middle. This goes on until the person in the middle gets the ball. Then, the person in the middle swaps with someone on the sides.
